# W14

# LTSM Crypto Predictor !

Due to the volatility of cryptocurrency speculation, investors will often try to incorporate sentiment from social media and news articles to help guide their trading strategies. One such indicator is the Crypto Fear and Greed Index (FNG) which attempts to use a variety of data sources to produce a daily FNG value for cryptocurrency. 

With this predictor we'll be comparing the difference between prediction based on daily (i) FNG Value and (ii) historical closing prices.


# Installations 

To run this project you need to install 
* Numpy
* Pandas
* Tenserflow 
* Hvplot 



# Project analysis 

* Which model has a lower loss?

Closing prices loss function 0.053777433931827545
FNG values loss function 0.07357713580131531

* Which model tracks the actual values better over time?

Closing prices tracks performance better over time 

* Which window size works best for the model?
